Newlywed Bindi Irwin, 21 has opened up about how she and her new husband Chandler Powell were forced to sacrifice their honeymoon plans back in March in order to save a cash-strapped Australia Zoo.

articles.title: Virgin Mary painting botched in failed restoration in Spain - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Think this 'restored' copy of a 400-year-old painting of the Virgin Mary looks bad? It gets worse.
articles.content:
The anonymous owner of a 16th-century artwork depicting the Virgin Mary was furious when his treasured possession returned from being cleaned looking like a misshapen lump with red lips.
